document_data.mainbody:
roya Harmoot was a Reghedmen human and the mistress of King Jarund Elkhardt from the Tribe of the Elk in the late 15 century DR.
Circa , hushed whispers among the tribe suggested that Froya had mothered a child for King Jarund Elkhardt, potentially weakening his wife Wynneths standing.Icewind Dale Rime of the Frostmaiden takes place in the winter of 1489 DR or later. According to the writers, the date is unimportant, so the adventure can technically take place later..
